## Purpose

Ingest textract data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("ingest/kristianstad_1.csv")

df %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), ~ str_squish(str_remove(.x, "\\'")))) %>% view()
```
